snippet.title: FNAF REWRITTEN 2024 Overhaul - TRAILER
snippet.description:
Five Nights at Freddy's Rewritten is a fan-made re-imagining of FNAF 1. 
Mike, the newest night guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza's last location, tries to survive five nights in a haunted pizzeria. Throughout the game, you will learn about Mike's questionable past as he is reunited with someone he thought he would never have a chance to talk to again.

The game is now available for download on Game Jolt!

GAME PAGE: https://gamejolt.com/games/Rewritten/777336
GEORGE 2D (Phone Guy): https://www.youtube.com/@George2D
Punk_Circus (some 2D art featured in the environments): https://www.instagram.com/punk_circus/

Why did the game get overhauled?
When I released the original version in 2023 I had used a bunch of free assets and FNAF VR models. I made the game to practice programming and lighting because most of my other work is 3D modeling and texturing. Because this game got popular I went back to replace all of the models I used with my own! I've also added some new gameplay elements and a surprise on night 5.
